item.title: Never Miss a New File with fswatch
item.description: ðŸ”¥ This is my first blog post â€¢ LETS GO! Context As someone with a new found interest in automating things, I have been working on building a local image search engine called WarpSearch. It will allow me to query locally stored images using text and this is amazing because I can dump all my images in one folder and be very hopeful that I will be able to find it later.
